verses.text: \w A|strong="H5921"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* desert \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Edom.

\w O|strong="H5315"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee do \w I|strong="H5315"\w* watch \w at|strong="H0413"\w* break \w of|strong="H0430"\w* day. \w For|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath thirsted; \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w my|strong="H4480"\w* flesh, \w O|strong="H5315"\w* how many ways!

\w In|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* desert land, \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w where|strong="H3808"\w* there \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w way|strong="H4131"\w*, \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* water: \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* sanctuary \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* come \w before|strong="H3808"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H0389"\w* see thy power \w and|strong="H6697"\w* thy glory.
\w For|strong="H5921"\w* thy mercy \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w better|strong="H5921"\w* \w than|strong="H5921"\w* lives: thee \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lips \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* praise.

Thus \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w I|strong="H0389"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w all|strong="H1288"\w* \w my|strong="H7130"\w* life long: \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* thy name \w I|strong="H0389"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* lift up \w my|strong="H7130"\w* hands.

\w Let|strong="H0389"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* filled \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H0430"\w* marrow \w and|strong="H0430"\w* fatness: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* thee \w with|strong="H0430"\w* joyful lips.

\w If|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* remembered thee upon \w my|strong="H3808"\w* bed, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* meditate \w on|strong="H0389"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* morning:

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* thou hast been \w my|strong="H5921"\w* helper. \w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* rejoice \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* covert \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy wings:
\w My|strong="H3605"\w* soul hath stuck \w close|strong="H3824"\w* \w to|strong="H6256"\w* thee: thy right hand hath received \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0389"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* sought \w my|strong="H5927"\w* soul \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* lower parts \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*:

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* delivered into \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sword, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* portions \w of|strong="H3820"\w* foxes.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king shall rejoice \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* shall \w be|strong="H0430"\w* praised \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w swear|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mouth \w is|strong="H0430"\w* stopped \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* wicked \w things|strong="H8147"\w*.
